mapper.update: update l_storagestructure set storageStructureID=storageStructureID ,storageStructureName=#{storageStructureName} ,orderno=#{orderno} where storageStructureID=#{storageStructureID}

update l_storagestructure set storageStructureID=storageStructureID ,storageStructureName=#{storageStructureName} ,orderno=#{orderno} where 1=1 and storageStructureID in (${Where_IdsStr}) and storageStructureID =#{Where_Id} and storageStructureID=#{Where_storageStructureID} and storageStructureName=#{Where_storageStructureName} and orderno=#{Where_orderno}
mapper.select: select t.storageStructureID "storageStructureID", t.storageStructureName "storageStructureName", t.orderno "orderno" from l_storagestructure t where storageStructureID=#{storageStructureID}

select t.storageStructureID "storageStructureID", t.storageStructureName "storageStructureName", t.orderno "orderno" from l_storagestructure t where 1=1 and t.storageStructureID=#{storageStructureID} and t.storageStructureName=#{storageStructureName} and t.orderno=#{orderno}

select t.storageStructureID "storageStructureID", t.storageStructureName "storageStructureName", t.orderno "orderno" from l_storagestructure t where 1=1 and t.storageStructureID=#{storageStructureID} and t.storageStructureName=#{storageStructureName} and t.orderno=#{orderno}
mapper.delete: delete from l_storagestructure where 1=1 and storageStructureID in (${Where_IdsStr}) and storageStructureID =#{Where_Id} and storageStructureID=#{Where_storageStructureID} and storageStructureName=#{Where_storageStructureName} and orderno=#{Where_orderno}
mapper.select: select t.storageStructureID "storageStructureID", t.storageStructureName "storageStructureName", t.orderno "orderno" from l_storagestructure t where 1=1 and t.storageStructureID=#{storageStructureID} and t.storageStructureName=#{storageStructureName} and t.orderno=#{orderno}

select count(*) from l_storagestructure t where 1=1 and t.storageStructureID=#{storageStructureID} and t.storageStructureID!=#{NoId} and t.storageStructureName=#{storageStructureName} and t.orderno=#{orderno}
